cluster_relations.rel_desc: The Brothers Grimm collected stories from peasants.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that an agent collected material (e.g., stories, data, specimens) from a source or informant group.
cluster_relations.object_class_group: Grimm Brothers Folk Tale Collection – Rural German Context

qualifiers.TemporalQualifier: during their early 19th century collecting work
qualifiers.CausalHint: to preserve the oral traditions of their culture

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The Brothers Grimm collected stories from villagers.

qualifiers.TemporalQualifier: during their early 19th century collecting work
qualifiers.CausalHint: to preserve the oral traditions of their culture

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The Brothers Grimm aimed to preserve oral traditions by collecting stories.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Denotes an intentional effort by an agent to preserve or safeguard a cultural, material, or conceptual object.
cluster_relations.object_class_label: German Cultural Heritage and Oral Traditions

qualifiers.OtherQualifier: Medium to be preserved: stories passed down verbally for generations

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The Brothers Grimm collected a particular version of the Snow White tale.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Links a collector or editor (e.g., the Brothers Grimm) to an individual tale or story that they gathered or recorded as part of a larger body of work, without implying original authorship.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The Brothers Grimm collected the tale 'Hansel and Gretel.'
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Links a collector or editor (e.g., the Brothers Grimm) to an individual tale or story that they gathered or recorded as part of a larger body of work, without implying original authorship.

qualifiers.ConditionExpression: as part of their fairy tale collection

args.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that an agent collects material (e.g., stories, data, specimens) from a source or informant group.
args.justification: Normalize the predicate to present tense ('collects_material_from') to align with other canonical relation names (e.g., 'collects_story') and maintain consistency across the schema, without changing the underlying semantics.
